plot: You care for your parents. You care for your children. Claire is a nurturing women whether its her daughter, her father or her vegetables.
title: Losing the Plot
plot_es: You care for your parents. You care for your children. Claire is a nurturing women whether its her daughter, her father or her vegetables.
